entry.title: my data science journey
entry.summary: Honestly,  I wasn’t going to wait that long, I went back home, got online and applied to Moringa School, I received an answer and was scheduled for an interview two days later and I started my classes on 14th October 2019 (Full-Time) for the next 23 weeks.
entry.content: Honestly,  I wasn’t going to wait that long, I went back home, got online and applied to Moringa School, I received an answer and was scheduled for an interview two days later and I started my classes on 14th October 2019 (Full-Time) for the next 23 weeks.
